page-title: COVID-19 Housing Protection Legislation and Housing Justice Action Map
about-title: COVID-19 Housing Protection Legislation & Housing Justice Action
about-description: Where officials have passed (or tenants are working to pass) housing protection legislation during the COVID-19 crisis.
legislation-form-usa: Submit housing protection legislation for locations in the United States.
legislation-form-intl: Submit housing protection legislation for locations outside of the United States.
housing-action-description: Where housing justice actions are occurring or have occured.
housing-action-form: Fill out to submit information about housing justice action (such as rent strikes, occupations, mutual aid).
resources-description: Here are some resources to get help if you are in need.

resources.right-to-the-city: Resources and demands from Right To The City Alliance and Homes For All.
resources.european-action-coalition: Resources and demands from the European Action Coalition for the Right to Housing.
